A good game ruined with one update because devs wanted some more money for their cigarettes, many people have been thrown under the bus after grinding for months, if not years, to get free prime, only to be a couple levels away before the cash grab update, which I like to call, that forces you to pay to play with a privileged userbase or tryhard adults who invest a fortune in their gaming equipment. Thankfully it's not the end of the world since games like Valorant exist, so if you want to actually have fun in a game, don't choose csgo and don't waste your time with prime. I've played csgo for two years with my brother, and got prime for free, but now playing against tryhards only isn't fun. Fun fact but buying stuff, especially online is a scarcity in many places outside the US, but did the devs care? They did care about their big fat first world wallets. The chater problem had also not been fixed, oh no, far from the truth, this had nothing to do with cheaters, cheaters invest money into their hacks too. Never in my life had I seen such hypocrisy from valve/ Just like apple ditching the charger to be environmental friendly when all they're doing is saving money and shifting the pollution to the consumer, because people still have to buy the charger separately = more packaging = more waste.
